item.title: Airport Tycoon
item.description: Run your own airport! In this game your job is to keep the runways in good conditions (and even build more), investing in better caffes and shops for your costumers, buying new routes for your planes, hiring tv stars to promote your empire and, of course, keep the baggage handling and the passport control department upgraded so it can serve all your daily passengers.
